field.value: JQueryHelper and AjaxHelper Enhancement for incorporating new JQueryHelper

field.name: description
field.value:
In order to incorporate the JQueryHelper, I needed to add the virtual keyword to 2 methods, methods: RemoteFunction(), BuildAjaxOptions
And optionally to 1 method for people who use InstallScripts in their layout views, the method being InstallScripts(). Also for people who use InstallScripts need to add JQuery resource file.
JQueryHelper.cs goes under /Helpers in the Castle.MonoRail.Framework project Resource file goes under /JSResources in the Castle.MonoRail.Framework project
